tasks.task: Assist in farming activities at the family farm
subtasks: Prep area for planting seeds
Plant seeds in prepared soil
Water newly planted seeds
Disinfect and store farm tools at the end of the day
Organize farm equipment in storage shed
Help with routine farm maintenance tasks
Drive tractor for seeding
Guide tractor with accuracy to plant rows properly
Adjust tractor attachments for seed planting
Measure and mix fertilizers
Load fertilizer into tractor for application
Assemble pesticide application equipment
Safely mix pesticides according to label instructions
Apply pesticides via tractor sprayer
Open coop door to allow chickens to enter
Carefully gather eggs from nesting boxes
Place eggs in basket or container for transport
Prepare feed rations for various animals
Distribute feed to livestock pens and troughs
Monitor animals for proper feeding and hydration
Inspect cows for signs of illness or injury
Check sheep for health issues or parasitic infestations
Administer routine vaccinations or medications
Attend church services in the farming community
Engage in community traditions and celebrations
Assist with local agricultural events or fairs
Update planting progress and crop health logs
Record livestock inventory and veterinary treatments
Document agricultural inputs and expenses
File and store important farm documents
Assist in pre-harvest preparation activities like mowing or irrigation
Supervise the drying or curing of crops if necessary
Operate combine harvester for grain crops
Guide the combine through fields to ensure efficient harvesting
Separate grain from chaff and load into trucks or silos
Clean harvested grain or vegetables
Store crops in appropriate conditions to prevent spoilage
Bag or package produce for market
Attend local farmers markets to sell produce
Prepare and present crops for sale
Receive payment and customer interaction
Plant seeds or seedlings in garden plots
Water garden plants regularly
Cultivate garden soil to remove weeds and debris
Pick ripe fruits and vegetables for family consumption
Clean farm living spaces and bathrooms
Maintain household appliances and fixtures
Purchase groceries and manage household tasks
Transfer harvested crops to storage facilities
Distribute goods to local stores or_delivery(truck for transportation)
Milking cows in the dairy barn
Clean teats and udders before milking
Collect milk in sanitary containers
Cool and process milk for storage or sale

tasks.task: But wait, is there a dairy barn mentioned? Wait, in the transcript, the main activities seemed to include farm work, chickens, livestock, social events, etc. So yeah, likely includes dairy farming, as that's a common aspect of family farms. So the tasks related to milking, cleaning teats, collecting milk, cooling, and processing would be relevant. So that MAINTASK is included here.

I think that's it. All the listed physical tasks are directly related to the transcript content, which talks about the wife's involvement in various farm activities and household duties. The MAINTASKs and their subtasks are categorized into farming operations, livestock management, social engagements, record keeping, and home life.
